function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential contamination of reagents and probes","Impact":"Inaccurate test results, leading to undetected cases and further spread of disease","Mitigation":"Stringent quality control measures and regular testing of reagents and probes","Technologies":"Automated reagent handling systems, advanced testing equipment","People":"Laboratory technicians, healthcare workers, community members","Owner":"Laboratories, healthcare facilities, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Poor predictive accuracy of model selection","Impact":"Misleading predictions leading to ineffective resource allocation and response strategies","Mitigation":"Validation through multiple performance metrics, rigorous testing of models with real-world data","Technologies":"Advanced analytical tools, machine learning algorithms","People":"Data scientists, public health experts, decision-makers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Digital revolution vulnerabilities","Impact":"Cybersecurity breaches, data privacy violations, and misinformation spread","Mitigation":"Robust cybersecurity measures, data encryption, education on digital hygiene and privacy","Technologies":"Secure data management systems, encryption technologies, digital hygiene tools","People":"IT professionals, data analysts, general public","Owner":"Government agencies, IT companies, educational institutions"}]}
